Jaeyoon Sim

▶︎ Hello, I am a M.S./Ph.D. integrated graduate student of Pohang University of Science and Technology(POSTECH) where I belong to graduate school of artificial intelligence(GSAI). Also I am a member of artificial intelligence and medical imaging lab(AIMI LAB) at POSTECH under Prof. Won H. Kim. I am interested in and mainly study computer engineering, especially vision and machine learning field.

Interesting Fields
  • Computer Vision
  • Deep Learning(DL)
  • Machine Learning(ML)
  • Image and Video Processing
  • Medical Imaging
